channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: There’s No Point In Arguing With Democrats About Trump
item.description: There is not a single fact, much less a body of them, that you and a lefty can agree upon to start a conversation about The Orange Man.

item.title: Abrego Garcia Was Never Simply a ‘Maryland Father’
item.description: The facts matter, and Abrego Garcia never should have been made into a mere symbol.

item.title: Judge dings Trump administration over rules designed to protect illegal immigrant children
item.description: A federal judge issued an injunction Monday against new rules the Trump administration adopted to try to keep illegal-immigrant minors from being plac...

item.title: Trump Should Force Congress And SCOTUS To Stop Rogue Judges By Ignoring Unconstitutional Injunctions
item.description: By continuing to face this crisis with appeals to higher courts, the president is bringing a knife to a gun fight. He should instead bring a howitzer.

item.title: State GOP Network Launches GOTV Campaign To Turn Virginia, New Jersey ‘Red’ This November
item.description: 'If anyone is out here saying on our side that it is going to be easy, that's just incorrect,' RSLC's Mason Di Palma told The Federalist.

item.title: IG Michael Horowitz Has Some Explaining To Do About FBI’s Ability To Hide Documents
item.description: IG Horowitz owes the American people an explanation about the lack of oversight.

item.title: Misinformation fuels anti-ICE protests in L.A., nationwide
item.description: Underlying the anti-ICE protests in Los Angeles are some basic misunderstandings about immigration law, such as who can be arrested, and where and whe...

item.title: RFK Jr. ousts CDC vaccine advisory committee
item.description: Health Secretary Robert F. Kennedy Jr. on Monday removed every member of a scientific committee that advises the Centers for Disease Control and Preve...

item.title: AI Can Help Stop Medicare Fraud. But It’s No Silver Bullet
item.description: The One Big Beautiful Bill takes a smart first step, but deeper reform is essential.

item.title: Judge rules Trump's 'Alien Enemies' deportations illegal
item.description: A federal judge ruled Monday that President Trump's proclamation invoking the Alien Enemies Act to speed up deportation of Venezuelan gang suspects is...

item.title: RFK Jr. removes entire CDC vaccine advisory committee
item.description: Health Secretary Robert F. Kennedy Jr., once a leading anti-vaccine activist, has removed every member of a scientific committee that advises the Cent...

item.title: The Pill That Makes Abortion Federal
item.description: If Trump truly wants to extricate the federal government from the abortion wars and empower states, his administration or Congress must move to restri...

item.title: New Texas Law Targets Mass Screen Addiction Among Kids
item.description: Unless parents make a concerted effort to deal with the smartphone, the great majority of kids will never come close to reaching their full potential.

item.title: New York Embraces the Culture of Death
item.description: Physician-assisted suicide’s corrupting influence is on the march. Kathy Hochul should veto it.

item.title: President Trump Has Legal Authority to Suppress the Siege in L.A.
item.description: The explicit purpose of the rioting and mayhem is to thwart the enforcement of federal immigration laws.
